text:
GETTY Kate Middleton: The Duchess wore pearl earrings and Monsoon wedges to complete the outfit

Kate Middleton, 35, showcased a favourite closet staple on Saturday while she attended a tea part to honour 850 children of men and women who had died serving in the British military. The Duchess glowed in a £320 See by Chloe dress at the occasion, which took place on the grounds of Buckingham Palace. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT The dress featured a ruffle collar and long sleeves, and she accessorised the outfit with delicate pearl drop earrings. Kate previously wore the outfit last September during a party for Prince George and Princess Charlotte.

GETTY Kate Middleton: The Duchess wore a lace Chloe dress to the occaison

She wore the same earrings and Monsoon wedges as the time before, but her hair was styled differently. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT Back in September, she swept her glossy locks into a half-updo, but yesterday she wore her hair down and straight, but full of volume. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT The Duchess and her husband Prince William, appeared at Saturday’s event without their children, but with William’s brother Prince Harry. The three were seen chatting and playing with kids and taking photos with them on the lawn.

GETTY Kate Middleton: The party was in honour of British military families

GETTY Kate Middleton: The Duchess and Prince William attended the event with Prince Harry

SUBSCRIBE Invalid email We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you've consented to and to improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and 3rd parties based on our understanding. You can unsubscribe at any time. Read our Privacy Policy

The party included various activities, including cupcake-decorating, plate-spinning, face-painting and water balloon battles. The Royal Foundation’s Full Effect and Coach Core programmes also led workshops in beatboxing, breakdancing and sports. The party at the palace aimed to unite children with other families that have shared similar experiences. She was photographed wearing her favourite colour earlier this week, ahead of her sister Pippa Middleton’s wedding.

GETTY Kate Middleton: The Duchess was last ed in the dress last September
title: Kate Middleton news: Thrifty Duchess of Cambridge rewears Chloe dress from last year

og.description: THE DUCHESS OF CAMBRIDGE re-wore a stunning lace Chloe dress to a kids’ party at the palace yesterday, which she last wore in September last year.
